sentences.en: "Corbiere didn't deserve this," she said enigmatically.
sentences.cn: “科比埃尔不配得到这个，”她令人费解地说。

sentences.en: "It's your money. You deserve it." — "What's the catch?"
sentences.cn: “这钱归你,你该拿这个钱.”——“搞什么名堂?”

sentences.en: Clare did not deserve the vilification she had been subjected to.
sentences.cn: 克莱尔不该受到这样的诽谤。

sentences.en: He didn't really deserve ( that ) she should be so kind to him.
sentences.cn: 他确实不值得她对他那么好.

sentences.en: He does deserve some good luck after so much wretchedness.
sentences.cn: 经过这么多苦难之后，他应该行点好运了。

sentences.en: His children's books are classics that deserve to be much better known.
sentences.cn: 他的儿童书非常经典，应该为更多人所知晓。

sentences.en: I do not deserve all the praises bestowed upon me.
sentences.cn: 我不配得到这些赞扬.

sentences.en: I would deserve to be pitied if I couldn't occupy myself.
sentences.cn: 如果我都不能让自己忙碌起来，那真是太可怜了。

sentences.en: I would never hit anyone, even if they deserved it.
sentences.cn: 我决不会打人，哪怕他欠揍。

sentences.en: I’m sorry for the kids. They deserve better (= deserve to be treated in a better way ) .
sentences.cn: 我为这些孩子感到难过，他们应该过得更好。

sentences.en: Ledley deserves a place in the team.
sentences.cn: 莱德利应该在队里占有一席之地。

sentences.en: Our long-suffering mining communities deserve better than this.
sentences.cn: 我们长期受苦受难的采矿群体应该得到比这更好的待遇。

sentences.en: Paula deserves a special mention for all the help she has given us.
sentences.cn: 应该特别提一下葆拉，她给了我们许多帮助。

sentences.en: People who are sent to prison for drunk-driving get what they deserve .
sentences.cn: 那些醉酒驾车被送进监狱的人是罪有应得的。

sentences.en: The players deserve a pat on the back.
sentences.cn: 球员们值得表扬。

sentences.en: These young louts deserve to be horse-whipped.
sentences.cn: 这些粗野的小子应该用马鞭狠狠抽一顿。

sentences.en: This proposal deserves serious consideration.
sentences.cn: 这个建议值得认真考虑。

sentences.en: Violent and dangerous yobs deserve to be locked up.
sentences.cn: 有暴力行为的危险野小子就应该被关起来。

sentences.en: What has he done to deserve this punishment ?
sentences.cn: 他做了什么，竟会受到这样的惩罚？

sentences.en: What have I done to deserve this?
sentences.cn: 我做了什么事，要得到这样的报应？

sentences.en: What punishment do you think you deserve?
sentences.cn: 该当何罪?

sentences.en: You deserve a rest after all that hard work.
sentences.cn: 辛苦劳累那么久，你该休息一下了。

sentences.en: You really deserve a good beating, you naughty boy.
sentences.cn: 你这个调皮孩子真该打.

words.tran_cn: 理所当然地；应得报酬地
值得；应得；应受报答（deserve的过去分词）
值得；应得到（deserve的现在分词）

trans.tran_en: to have earned something by good or bad actions or behaviour
to have earned something by good or bad actions or behaviour
